publications.title: Generation of a gene-corrected human isogenic iPSC line from an Alzheimer’s disease iPSC line carrying the London mutation in APP (V717I)

donor.disease_description: Dominantly inherited Alzheimer's disease caused by APP London mutation (V717I)

genomic_modifications.description: Gene correction and silent mutation in one single allele (Heterozygous mutation) of APP London mutation (V717I, rs63750264) in exon 17
genomic_modifications.genotype: Heterozygous: APP V717I mutation corrected to wild type; silent PAM mutation introduced

genomic_characterisation.summary: Copy number variation analysis of isogenic iPSCs was performed using Illumina Infinium CoreExome-24 v1.1. Analysis confirmed absence of deletions, insertions and aneuploidies.

induced_derivation.non_int_vector_name: Episomal vectors (containing OCT4, SOX2, KLF4, L-MYC, LIN28 and shRNA against p53)

ethics.institutional_HREC: University of Melbourne Human Research Ethics Committee
